code: import React from"react";import{FaEdit,FaTrash}from"react-icons/fa";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const List=_ref=>{let{items,removeItem,editeItem}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grocery-list",children:items.map(item=>{const{id,title}=item;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"grocery-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btn-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"edit-btn",onClick:()=>editeItem(id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaEdit,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-btn",onClick:()=>removeItem(id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTrash,{})})]})]},id);})})});};export default List;
